reviews.text: This Connecticut gem is set in beautiful parkland with wild turkey, turtles and numerous birds. The rooms are large, spacious and comfortable. What's missing are slippers and decent toiletries - they were really limited and poor quality.
reviews.title: Perfect business and wedding venue

reviews.text: The staff are fantastic - its like a family here - and saw to it that all I needed was covered.
reviews.title: beautiful, restful views

reviews.text: The Bar food was a real find and the small, healthy plates could be delivered to your room.
reviews.title: Pleasant conference center on grounds of what used to be monastery

reviews.text: Free wifi is a huge plus and plenty of sockets for the laptops/phone/ipad!
reviews.title: Dolce is very "dolce"!

reviews.text: Was at this property in April, 2013 for 3 nights for meeting. My room was very zen-like and looked out at gorgeous property with ornamental trees in full bloom with flowers. Room well-furnished, super-comfortable bed. Excellent heating/air-conditioning in room and was able to keep on a low-fan speed to provide "white-noise" so I did not hear any noise from the hallway.
reviews.title: Wonderful Conference Site - excellent Staff and 5 Star Dining!
